ongoingEvents.title: FACILITIES TEAM NEEDS YOU!
ongoingEvents.description: There are a number of small fixes and tweaks that are in need of attention around our building and grounds. If you’re interested in helping out - even if your handy skill level is low - please volunteer. Email fred.walker@yale.edu to help out.

ongoingEvents.title: Full Sunday Schedule
ongoingEvents.description:
• Prayer @ 8:30am,
  • Children’s and Adult Sunday Studies @ 9:30am,
  • Weekly Fellowship Lunches after worship
